theShadeThatFades:TwistedSorcery.NAME: Twisted Sorcery
theShadeThatFades:TwistedSorcery.FLAVOR: The influence of the Dark Ones can be an addicting source of power.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, gain #b1 #ytheshadethatfades:Corruption.

theShadeThatFades:DiabolicalSorcery.NAME: Diabolical Sorcery
theShadeThatFades:DiabolicalSorcery.FLAVOR: No one is safe from the influence of the Dark Ones.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #yTwistedSorcery. At the start of your turn, everyone gains #b1 #ytheshadethatfades:Corruption.

theShadeThatFades:FifthShadow.NAME: Fifth Shadow
theShadeThatFades:FifthShadow.FLAVOR: Better sew it to your shoes this time.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of turn 5, gain #yIntangible.

theShadeThatFades:WiltingRose.NAME: Wilting Rose
theShadeThatFades:WiltingRose.FLAVOR: Typical Rose, always meddling with eldritch horrors.
DESCRIPTIONS: Applying #ytheshadethatfades:Wither to enemies that are not withering also makes them #yWeak.

theShadeThatFades:HellfireTalisman.NAME: Hellfire Talisman
theShadeThatFades:HellfireTalisman.FLAVOR: Say what you want about demons, but they sure know their arson.
DESCRIPTIONS: Applying #ytheshadethatfades:Burning to enemies that are not burning also makes them #yVulnerable.

theShadeThatFades:BurningTome.NAME: Burning Tome
theShadeThatFades:BurningTome.FLAVOR: Burns your hand when held. This tome ironically doesn't contain much info about fire magic.
DESCRIPTIONS: Draw 1 additional card each turn. At the start of combat, gain 3 #ytheshadethatfades:Burning.

theShadeThatFades:CursedTome.NAME: Abyssal Tome
theShadeThatFades:CursedTome.FLAVOR: The fatigue is from carrying around such a heavy tome.
DESCRIPTIONS: Draw 1 additional card each turn. At the start of combat, add a Fatigue to your hand.

theShadeThatFades:TitanTome.NAME: Titan Tome
DESCRIPTIONS: Draw 1 additional card each turn. At the start of each of their turns after turn 7, all enemies heal for 50 HP.

theShadeThatFades:TetheredCrystal.NAME: Tethered Crystal
theShadeThatFades:TetheredCrystal.FLAVOR: After all, why should you be the one to suffer?
DESCRIPTIONS: Stores damage you take during your turn. At the end of combat, heals you that amount.

theShadeThatFades:BottledPlaceholderReli.NAME: Bottled Placeholder
DESCRIPTIONS: Choose a card. Whenever you take play any card, draw the chosen card.
Whenever you play a card, draw
Select a card to bottle for
